void
INfaManager.register(android.app.Activity activity, INfaBeam<Record> beamWriter, INfaIntentFilter... filters)

void
INfaManager.register(android.app.Activity activity, NfaRecieveBean<Record> recieveConfiguration, INfaBeam<Record> beamWriter, INfaIntentFilter... filters)
